title: Amazing Caves
subtle: Descriptive (nonfiction), 40 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 100L
description: Have you ever explored a cave? If so, what did you discover? Amazing Caves takes students on a beautiful journey that explores different kinds of caves. Repetitive sentences, high-frequency words, and vivid photographs support early emergent readers. This book can also be used to teach how to determine the author's purpose and use declarative sentences.
reviewWords: bright, cave, crystals, drawings, sharp, shiny
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /b/ sound
grammar: Declarative Sentences                : Recognize and use declarative sentences
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word this
